
                            
                            <p>1、先用VX或者京东扫描下面二维码进去领取9元京东无门槛券（如果领完了就第二天0点再去，每天0点会补充库存） <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/12/010646bprazjui7zrp0yqy.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/12/010646bprazjui7zrp0yqy.png"> <br> 2、再用VX或者京东扫描下面二维码进去将9.1元抽纸加入购物车，先不付款 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/12/010646s9dm6ggxx266k47x.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/12/010646s9dm6ggxx266k47x.png"> <br>  <br> 3、再打开“中国银行”APP搜索【京东超级省】进去，点底部【购物车】进去付款，选择中国银行卡就会立减9元，等于0.1元购买，如果没有减9元就取消订单重新买  <br> </p>
                            <p>
